alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 11:01AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Woodruff, south central Independence, northern Prairie, southern Jackson, southeastern Cleburne, northwestern Lonoke, White and northeastern Pulaski Counties through NOON CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rose Bud to near Gravel Hill to near Cabot. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cabot... Searcy... Newport... Augusta... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Ward... Bald Knob... Austin in Lonoke County... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Patterson... Russell... West Point... Tupelo... Old Austin... McCrory... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White; Woodruff
